articles.description: All the reaction to the weekend's Premier League games, as Arsenal move top, Aston Villa beat Tottenham and Alejandro Garnacho scores a wonder goal for Manchester United.
articles.title: Football latest: Arsenal move top & Villa into top four

articles.description: Terry Venables' impact as manager of Barcelona cannot be underestimated, writes Spanish football expert Guillem Balague.
articles.title: 'A special man and trailblazer - Venables' lasting legacy at Barca'

articles.description: Terry Venables was "the best English coach we've had", says Gary Lineker as he leads tributes to the former England boss.
articles.title: Venables the best English coach we've had - Lineker

articles.description: Jalen Hurts scores a walk-off touchdown as the Philadelphia Eagles win an overtime thriller against the Buffalo Bills while Bill Belichick's job is on the line after another Patriots defeat.
articles.title: Hurts the hero as Eagles win overtime classic

articles.description: Has Alejandro Garnacho already wrapped up goal of the season - and how does his effort compare to some classic overhead kicks?
articles.title: 'Best goal I've seen live' - Garnacho scores 'goal of season'

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores his 13th goal of the season as Real Madrid return to the top of La Liga with a 3-0 victory at lowly Cadiz.
articles.title: Bellingham scores as Real return to top of La Liga

articles.description: Jannik Sinner beats Alex de Minaur in straight sets to secure Italy's first Davis Cup title for 47 years.
articles.title: Italy win first Davis Cup title for 47 years

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Jermaine Jenas says the trip to Manchester City next weekend might be the time for Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou to adapt his playing style.
articles.title: 'Spurs’ feel-good factor will not last forever'

articles.description: The 2023 F1 season draws to a close with another crushing Max Verstappen victory - beating him next season has been likened to conquering the highest mountain in the world.
articles.title: Dominant Red Bull leave rivals facing 'Mount Everest'

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is a gem? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week
